text:
e="preserve">Keith Barron (8 August 1934 – 15 November 2017) was an English actor. He appeared in many movie roles and on television from 1961 until 2015. His television roles included the police drama "The Odd Man", the sitcom "Duty Free" and Gregory Wilmot in "Upstairs, Downstairs". He was born in Mexborough, South Yorkshire, England.
Barron died on 15 November 2017 at the age of 83.
